successes.title: Fairytale Games: The Miniatures Campaign
successes.description: Beautifully sculpted Fairytale Miniatures you can collect or use with the Fairytale Games Universe, based on artwork from our games!

Pledges.description: TOTO ~ For fans who want to support our campaign or for those who are itching to get in on the new roster of fighters for Super Fairytale Fighters 2, this reward gets you one of the 4 Battle Packs for this spinoff card game! (Battle Pack contains two 54 card decks).

LITTLE BOY BLUE ~ For INTERNATIONAL fans who want to support our campaign or for those who are itching to get in on the new roster of fighters for Super Fairytale Fighters 2, this reward gets you one of the 4 Battle Packs for this spinoff card game! (Battle Pack contains two 54 card decks). MINIATURE ADD-ONS ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR THIS REWARD TIER.
PUSS IN BOOTS ~ You will receive your choice of one highly detailed Miniature from our "Character" List.
THREE LITTLE PIGS ~ You will receive your choice of    3 highly detailed Miniatures from our "Character" List.

SNOW - A Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Set with SIX Characters + 1 Boss Character AND an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. (WOW! As we unlock "Box Sets" in our stretch goals, you can choose your set from among them!)
MORGAN LA FAY ~ You will get your choice of 2 Fairytale Game Editions (not expansions) and 1 mini character of your choice. (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

BIG BAD WOLF - Get Both Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Sets with TEN Characters + 1 Boss Character PLUS An Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

THE HATTER ~ This tier is perfect for the backer who just wants the card game! This tier includes ALL 4 EDITIONS of Fairytale Games (Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, and Zombie Edition). This will also come with BOTH expansion packs (Fairytale Expansion and Legends of Time), the Pulp Fantasy Character Pack, Gingerbread Pack, and the Strawberry Cheesecake Pack. PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

THE MAD HATTER ~ This tier is perfect for the backer who just wants the card game! This tier includes ALL 4 EDITIONS of Fairytale Games (Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, and Zombie Edition). This will also come with BOTH expansion packs (Fairytale Expansion and Legends of Time), the Pulp Fantasy Character Pack, Gingerbread Pack, and the Strawberry Cheesecake Pack. PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

THE BEAST - Get Both Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Sets with TEN Characters + 1 Boss Character AND your choice of one Fairytale Games Base Standalone Game (Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, or Zombie Edition) PLUS An Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

CINDERELLA ~  Get Both Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Sets with TEN Characters + 1 Boss Character AND a Volume 2 Artbook PLUS An Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

IRON JOHN -~ Get Both Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Sets with TEN Characters + 1 Boss Character AND All 4 Editions of Fairytale Games (Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, and Zombie Edition) PLUS An Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge) - $150

Golem - Get Both Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Sets with TEN Characters + 1 Boss Character AND your choice of one Fairytale Games Base Standalone Game (Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, or Zombie Edition). You will also receive a beautifully illustrated 200 page Hardcover Art Book, an 20"x17" Art Print of your choice, PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

NUTCRACKER PRINCE ~ For those who are here for our beautifully designed miniatures only, this tier offers ALL BOX SETS and the SACRED 40 MINIS (from the add-ons) as well as ALL STRETCH GOALS! You'll also receive an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss card + Quest Card Variant! (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

ALICE IN WONDERLAND ~ For previous backers who want just the new campaign items, this tier is for you! You will receive the All Mini Box Sets, Pulp Fantasy Character Pack, Volume 2 Hardcover Artbook, Mother Goose's Nursery Rhymes, Fairytale Games Deck of Playing Cards, Fairytale Games Hardcover Storybook AND a 20"x17" Poster Sized Art Print of your choice PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

JABBERWOCK ~ Get Both Fairytale Games Miniatures Boxed Sets with TEN Characters + 1 Boss Character AND All 4 Editions of Fairytale Games (Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, or Zombie Edition) AND Both Expansions (Fairytale Expansion and Legends of Time Expansions.) You will also receive a beautifully illustrated 200 page Hardcover Art Book, an 20"x17" Art Print of your choice, PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

CAPTAIN NEMO ~ Bring the entire Fairytale Games Universe to you! Receive Fairytale Games: The Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, Zombie Edition, Fairytale Expansion Pack, Legends of Time Expansion Pack, Minis Box Set 1 and 2, a 300 Page Hardcover Artbook (Volume 1), a 200 Page Hardcover Art Book (Volume 2), Rumplestiltskin, and Super Fairytale Fighters 2 Battle Set 1 and 2 PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

PRINCE DAKKAR ~ Bring the entire Fairytale Games Universe to you! Receive Fairytale Games: The Battle Royale, Horror Edition, Steampunk Edition, Zombie Edition, Fairytale Expansion Pack, Legends of Time Expansion Pack, Minis Box Set 1 and 2, a 200 Page Hardcover Artbook (Volume 1), a 200 Page Hardcover Art Book (Volume 2), Rumplestiltskin, and Super Fairytale Fighters 2 Battle Set 1 and 2 AND all "Sacred 40" Minis (in Eternal Gray only) PLUS an Illustrated E-Book with Bios/Storylines of each Miniature Character and an EXCLUSIVE Queen of Hearts Boss + Quest Card Variant. This tier ALSO RECEIVES ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)

KNIGHTS OF THE ROUND TABLE ~ Create your own character with your likeness and be immortalized in RESIN, designed personally by the sculptor of the 3D models in the hit video game BioShock! Not only that, we will include your Player Card and Character Card compatible with Fairytale Games: The Battle Royale. We will also give you a 20"x17" Art Print of your character and a signed certification of authenticity by the sculptor! AND Receive EVERYTHING in the Prince Dakkar Reward Tier! (Please add your area Shipping amount manually to your Pledge)
